Introduction.title: We care for your pets.
Introduction.subtitle: A vet you can trust.
Introduction.imageAlt: Un mignon chien noir portant un chandail en tricot.

About.title: About Us
About.description: Welcome to our veterinary website, where we are dedicated to providing top-quality care for your pets. Our experienced veterinarians and advanced facility offer comprehensive medical services to keep your furry family members healthy and happy. Trust us with your pet's well-being, because they deserve the best care possible.
About.imageAlt: Un vétérinaire tenant une seringue près d'un chien mignon.

Services.title: Services
Services.vaccinationDescription: Protect your pet's health with essential vaccinations that prevent diseases and ensure their well-being.
Services.microchippingDescription: Safeguard your pet with micro-chipping, a reliable way to ensure their identification and safe return.
Services.neuteringDescription: Ensure your pet's well-being with neutering, a responsible choice for population control and behavior management.

ServicesPage.description: Explore our comprehensive range of veterinary services designed to keep your pets healthy and happy.
ServicesPage.altImage: Un petit chien avec de grandes oreilles.

Reservation.cardNumberRequired: Credit card must be a number
Reservation.confirmationMessage: Thank you for booking your appointment at Pawsome Vet!

SpecificService.RabiesVaccineDescription: Protect your dog from rabies with this vital and preventive vaccine.
SpecificService.DistemperVaccineDescription: Essential protection against a highly contagious and potentially deadly viral disease.
SpecificService.HepatitisVaccineDescription: Safeguard your dog's health with this crucial vaccine against canine hepatitis.
SpecificService.FelineRabiesVaccineDescription: Crucial protection against a deadly viral disease for feline companions.
SpecificService.PanleukopeniaVaccineDescription: Essential defense against a highly contagious and severe feline viral infection.
SpecificService.PolyomavirusVaccineDescription: Vital protection against a dangerous and contagious viral infection in birds.
SpecificService.NeuteringFelineDescription: Responsible choice for population control and behavior management in feline companions.
SpecificService.NeuteringCanineDescription: Responsible choice for population control and behavior management in canine companions.
SpecificService.MicrochippingBirdsDescription: Reliable identification for birds, ensuring their safety and proper ownership.
SpecificService.MicrochippingCatsDescription: Secure identification for cats, ensuring their safety and easy reunification.
SpecificService.MicrochippingDogsDescription: Secure identification for dogs, ensuring their safety and easy reunification.
